name: i-Flame
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Fireplace”
”Alexa, turn off the Fireplace”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control all your i-Flame enabled appliances by spoken command. Say "Alexa, Turn On Fireplace". Now you can control your i-Flame products from your app or Alexa. 

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your i-Flame account and discover your shades. You can custom name your shades in the i-Flame app by navigating to the settings button.
